com.bizosys.hsearch.dictionary
Class DictionaryManager

java.lang.Object
  com.bizosys.hsearch.dictionary.DictionaryManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.bizosys.oneline.plugin.Pluggable, com.bizosys.oneline.services.Service
public class DictionaryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.bizosys.oneline.services.Service

This is the Facade for the dictionry service. It's responsible for initializing dictionry service as well as serving clients. This is the single entry point for outside clients to perform dictionry operations.

Author:
karan
